dublinCore.dc:title: HCON 82 ENR: Providing a correction in the enrollment of S. 540.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.congress: One Hundred Thirteenth Congress of the United States of America
form.enrolled-dateline: Begun and held at the City of Washington on Friday, the third day of January, two thousand and fourteen
form.official-title: Providing a correction in the enrollment of S. 540.

section.text: That in the enrollment of the bill, S. 540, the Secretary of the Senate shall amend the title so as to read: To temporarily extend the public debt limit, and for other purposes..

attestation-group.role: Clerk of the House of Representatives.
